item.description: This incredible night of music and friends is to support a very important cause: that children be placed with the better parent rather than the mother every time. It well be held Friday December 9th at FTS Gallery at 2415 Main Street, Stratford, from 7 to 11:30 Chris Fleury deserves primary residency for a number of reasons; I cannot share here due to potential legal ...problems, but if you ask, we'll both share. So,thanks to all the INCREDIBLE people who have donated to both the online fundraiser and we will have a night filled with great music from Steve DeTroy, Brian Kelly and Steven Michael Zack. There will be food and refreshments, as well as raffle and auction prizes: we have two sets of tickets to any performance at the Quick Center, a yoga package of a mat and three free classes, a free photography/portrait package, a gift certificate to FTS, a package of three screen printed shirts, two tickets to Black Rock Rocks, several gift certificate to Marty's Pizza, a gift certificate to a hair salon, some Christmas packages, a large red bulldog and have even more on the way. There will also be 50/50 raffles every hour starting at 8. There is a suggested donation of $10 dollars at the door, which covers all food, beverages and musical entertainment. We look forward to a night filled with great music, food and friends for a cause truly worth supporting. We hope to see you all there. If you cannot attend, the online fundraiser is below. http://www.giveforwar...
item.name: Night of music, food, beverages and fun to help Chris Fleury
